title: Azir passive bug
body: Azir can use his passive on fountain and spawn it there. It will NEVER be destroyed because it will heal and Azir can no longer use his passive as a result. GG.

replies.body: As long as we're talking about Azir's passive, has anyone else noticed that when you die under your passive turret as Azir the enemy champion who had aggro will just drop it magically and your turret will just start attacking minions or something? Really annoying.
was there a Yorick on the team that Azir was on?
